name: The End of All Demons
description:
Welcome to the ending.

Arrow keys to move around

Spacebar to shoot

Other controls may exist... but you’ll have to find them yourself.

THIS GAME IS STILL A WORK IN PROGRESS, SO I ASK THAT ANYONE TRYING THE GAME TO PLEASE COME BACK LATER WHEN THIS MESSAGE IS GONE AND PLAY THE FINAL VERSION. YOU WON’T REGRET IT.
